lead_paragraph: Octo Telematics of Italy, whose devices help auto insurers set rates, is preparing its United States offering at a difficult time for market debuts.

headline.print_headline: I.P.O. Is Planned for Provider to Car Insurers of Tech That Monitors Driving
headline.main: Octo Telematics, Whose Technology Monitors Driving, Prepares I.P.O.

snippet: Octo Telematics of Italy, whose devices help auto insurers set rates, is preparing its United States offering at a difficult time for market debuts.
abstract: Octo Telematics is preparing for initial public offering in United States, despite market conditions that are scaring off other potential initial public offerings; company, which produces technology that allows insurance companies to monitors driving patterns of car owners, hope to generate $350 million in proceeds and is aiming at valuation of at least $2 billion.
